title: GET_TRAIN_FORWARD_CARRIAGE
content:
0x24DC88D9// GetTrainForwardCarriage
int GET_TRAIN_FORWARD_CARRIAGE(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The handle of the carriage in front of this train in the chain. Otherwise returns 0 if the train has no carriage in front of it
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_FORWARD_CARRIAGE
GetTrainForwardCarriage(vehicle)
